email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a prompt vessel available for your shipment of 15,000MT of steel coils from Busan to Los Angeles on CFR terms.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 45,000 and LOA of 200m. The laycan is set for 15th to 20th November, and the loading window is 48 hours. The initial freight quote is USD 55 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the prompt offer. Given the current market conditions, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 50 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
James Wilson
Global Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 52 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 15th to 20th November, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 52 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
James Wilson
Global Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Busan on 15th November, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
James Wilson
Global Freight
